mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, username, password, nickname, email, gender, birthdate, tel, address, created_at, updated_at, isdelete from member where username = #{username} and isdelete = 'F'
mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, username, password, nickname, email, gender, birthdate, tel, address, created_at, updated_at, isdelete) values (seq_member.nextval, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthdate}, #{tel}, #{address}, sysdate, sysdate, #{isdelete})
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, updated_at = SYSDATE where username = #{username}
mapper.delete: update member set isdelete = 'T', updated_at = SYSDATE where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select MU.* from member M join belongmember B on m.member_id = b.member_id join meetup MU on b.meet_up_id = mu.meet_up_id WHERE m.username = #{username}
